thread.section_title: Crowne Plaza London Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel, great location
thread.title_full: Great hotel, great location - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: KittyCatSingapore
title: Great hotel, great location
text:
Enjoyed my stay very much in a comfortable hotel with well appointed rooms. The rooms are pretty large for a London hotel. The USB charging ports were a nice touch in addition to the numerous power points
Location is also great, just across from Gloucester Road Tube Station. There is a also a supermart with fresh produce and and tasty bites.
